tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donors AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, o.name, f.amp_donor_org_id, o.org_grp_id, gr.org_type AS org_type_id FROM amp_funding f, amp_organisation o, amp_org_group gr WHERE ((f.amp_donor_org_id = o.amp_org_id) AND (o.org_grp_id = gr.amp_org_grp_id)) ORDER BY f.amp_activity_id, o.name;;;
